meanings.definition: relating to the study or tracing of lines of family descent
meanings.sent1: The genealogical research revealed interesting facts about my family history.
meanings.sent2: She attended a genealogical conference to learn more about her ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The genealogical investigation turned up a surprising connection to royalty.
meanings.sent4: Her genealogical expertise was like a map guiding us through our family tree.
meanings.sent5: The genealogical records painted a vivid picture of our lineage.
